oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition pennant, 1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Artifact 2016.002 Appalachian Exposition pennant, 1910. Pennant made of red, white and blue felt sewn together with metal band for hanging at the top. Gold glitter design and lettering: Knoxville, Tenn. 1910 Souvenir.' Printed paper disk in center with photograph of the Administration Building and the words 'Appalachian Exposition Sep. 12 to Oct. 12, 1910.' 7.25" high at end, 16.75 " long to end of point. 1 pc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fairs; Souvenirs; Artifacts; Pennants;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
